trans-unit.source: Defines properties and methods for all activity designers that have a sequential vertical layout on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Define propriedades e métodos para todos os designers de atividade que têm um layout vertical sequencial na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> and classes that inherit from it can contain child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> e classes que herdam de que ele podem conter os designers de atividade filho.

trans-unit.source: Their appearance on the workflow design surface is organized vertically, with child activities displayed on the surface of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Sua aparência na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho é organizada verticalmente, com atividades filho exibidas na superfície do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that allows the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> to adjust its UI for users who have disabilities.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que permite que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> ajuste sua interface do usuário para usuários com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> a ser associado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: If the initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> creates an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor inicial de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> é uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> can be expanded and collapsed on the workflow designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> pode ser expandido e recolhido na superfície do designer de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer can be expanded and collapsed on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o designer pode ser expandido e recolhido na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> returns `true`, the designer renders an expand-collapse button on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> retorna `true`, o designer processa um botão expandir-recolher na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: If the parent designer of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer do pai do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> é <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> is the root designer, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> é o designer raiz, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer is expanded on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o designer é expandido na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> is expanded on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> é expandida na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz de retângulos que delimitam os conectores do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> array that bounds the connectors.
trans-unit.target: A matriz <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que delimita os conectores.

trans-unit.source: If the current designer is not the active designer or if the designer is not expanded, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.GetConnectors%2A> returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer atual não é um designer ativo ou se o designer não está expandido, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.GetConnectors%2A> retorna uma matriz vazia.

trans-unit.source: If there are no activity designers in the parent designer, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.GetConnectors%2A> returns an array of one rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum designers de atividade no designer de pai, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.GetConnectors%2A> retorna uma matriz de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que define as coordenadas x e y para a reprodução automática.

trans-unit.source: Returns array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz de retângulos que representam os locais de destino válidos dentro do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: A matriz <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os locais de destino válidos no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual na ordem da navegação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> que determina a ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o primeiro objeto selecionável que segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that follows the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <see cref="T:System.Object" /> selecionável que segue o parâmetro <paramref name="obj" /> na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of glyphs that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção somente leitura de glifos que estão associados ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> read-only collection that contains all of the glyphs to display on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> coleção somente leitura que contém todos os glifos para exibir o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display when the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> contains no other activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto a ser exibido quando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> não contém nenhum outro designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text to display on the designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto a ser exibido na superfície do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A> property value is displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> surface when it contains no child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A> o valor da propriedade é exibido no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> superfície quando não contiver nenhum designers de atividade filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that serves as the bounds for the text displayed by the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo que serve como os limites para o texto exibido pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that serves as the bounds for the text displayed by the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que serve como os limites para o texto exibido, o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText" /> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height and width of the text to display in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> when it contains no child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura e largura do texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> quando ele não contém nenhum designer de atividade filho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that defines the height and width of the text displayed by <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> when it contains no child activity designers.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que define a altura e largura do texto exibido por <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> quando ele contém nenhum designers de atividade filho.

trans-unit.source: By default <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpTextSize" /> is set to a newly initialized <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpTextSize" /> é definido como um recentemente inicializado <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> location on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: O local <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho do qual coletar informações.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> at the specified point on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" /> no ponto especificado na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que contém informações sobre a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The information returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> is based on the point on the workflow design surface that was passed to it.
trans-unit.target: As informações retornadas por <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> baseia-se o ponto na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho que foi passado.

trans-unit.source: It includes the activity designer associated with the point, the bounds of that activity designer, the exact hit location of the point, any selectable objects associated with the point, and any user data associated with the point.
trans-unit.target: Ele inclui o designer de atividade associado com o ponto, os limites do designer de atividade, o local exato de ocorrência do ponto, quaisquer objetos selecionáveis associados ao ponto e nenhum dado de usuário associado ao ponto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> with which to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> com o qual inicializar o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer usando a atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Initialize%2A> assigns a value for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A> property that is displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> if it does not contain any child designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Initialize%2A> atribui um valor para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A> que é exibida na propriedade de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> se ele não contém qualquer designers filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de layout para posicionar indicações visuais e designers filho no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho das indicações visuais nos designers contidos dentro do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that contains the new size settings for <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que contém as novas configurações de tamanho para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the drawing arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> que contém os argumentos de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of activity at design time.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a representação visual da atividade em tempo de design.
